description.value:
Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or star system. Small vessels meant for shor-range Trade Routes between nearby systems, making quick journeys back and fourth of 1-2 jumps. A quick way to get to somewhere nearby in astronomical terms although you'll have little ability to dictate a specific location. Decent enough comfort.

Requirements

Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 2800 T
